content: ChatGPT offers a free 'Prompt Optimizer' feature, accessible via specific URLs (e.g., https://platform.openai.com/chat/edit?models=gpt-5&optimize=true), which users can leverage to improve their prompts.
Effective AI prompting involves several tips, including dictation, strategies to reduce hallucinations, utilizing projects, developing AI habits, and employing a 'Canvas' approach.
